profile.name: Fabio Giglietto
profile.bio: Professor of Internet Studies at University of Urbino Carlo Bo

repositories.name: toread
repositories.description: Consume a feed BibTeX export from a Paperpile folder, complete the publication metadata with Crossref and Semantic Scholar and create an RSS feed

repositories.name: fabiogiglietto.github.io
repositories.description: AI-driven academic portfolio with automated content aggregation and intelligent web mentions discovery - like Yahoo Pipes for academics, but with GPT-4 superpowers! A modern Jekyll site that mashes up publication APIs, social feeds, and scholarly references into one sleek, auto-updating research showcase.

repositories.name: csds-preprocessor
repositories.description: CSDS Pre-processor - A web application that transforms social media data from various platforms into the standardized format required by the Coordinated Sharing Detection Service.

repositories.name: italian-facebook-analysis
repositories.description: Interactive visualization of Italian Facebook URL data from 2018 and 2022 elections

repositories.name: NewsExposure_cluster_viz
repositories.description: Interactive visualization of News cluster furing the 2018 - 2022 Italian election campaings

repositories.name: CooRnet_at_DMI_WS_2023
repositories.description: Code and data repository for the "Detecting Coordinated Link Sharing Behaviour with CooRnet" tutorial of the Digital Media Initiative 2023 Winter School

repositories.name: CooRnet
repositories.description: Given a set of URLs, this packages detects coordinated link sharing behavior on social media and outputs the network of entities that performed such behaviour.

repositories.name: CooRnet_ImgTxt
repositories.description: Simple scripts that reuses some CooRnet code to detect coordinated network of Facebook/Instagram accounts that repeatedly shares images with identical text in a short period of time.

repositories.name: Semantic-Clustering-Italian-News
repositories.description: This repository contains the supporting code and data for the paper "Semantic Clustering of Italian Political News on Facebook: Comparing text-embedding-3-large and UmBERTo Embeddings using HDBSCAN and K-means."

repositories.name: Global_CLSB
repositories.description: List of coordinated networks and accounts that circulated on Facebook problematic news stories rated as problematic by third-party fact-checkers

repositories.name: coord_link_share_ct
repositories.description: Script that analyzes a "CrowdTangle shares dataset" (response from CT API endpoint) in order to find entities (account, pages, groups) that shared the same links is short period of time

repositories.name: longurl
repositories.description: :information_source: Small R package for the URL Expander API

repositories.name: huginn
repositories.description: Build agents that monitor and act on your behalf.  Your agents are standing by!
